TermDefinition.DefinitionText: In cancer treatment, substances that kill cancer cells by targeting key molecules involved in cancer cell growth.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "molecularly targeted therapy"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "terapia molecularmente dirigida"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Con respecto al tratamiento del cáncer, sustancias que destruyen las células cancerosas al dirigirse a moléculas clave que participan en el crecimiento de la célula cancerosa.
